### Cutoff = `r cutoff`


```{r }
ndata <- length(data)
lbl <- gsub(", ","-",label)
nfn <- paste("../reports/figs/network-035b",lbl,cutoff*10,sep="-")
```

```{r }
set.seed(1234)
source('mixOmics_network.R')
nw <- network(x
        , blocks = 1:ndata
        , color.node = cols
        , cutoff = cutoff
        , shape.node = "rectangle"
        , layout = layout.fun # default layout.fruchterman.reingold
        , save = "png"
        , name.save = nfn
        , plot.graph = TRUE
        )
```
